name: Event Prep Master 1
description: This procedure shall be completed 48hours before any events.

steps.instruction: Curzon Hall Lobby staircase pressurisation can be triggered from fire alarm.
steps.helpText: Must inform control room if triggering fire alarm.

steps.instruction: Curzon Hall Lobby Court West external Gates can be unlocked remotely.
